text: Geukheun lom meunoe wahe ya Allah Hai Tuhan kamoe Neubri keu kamoe Dum judo kamoe ureueng meutuah d Meunan pih aneuk ngon cuco kamoe Bak mata kamoe beu sijuek leupah Ã­ Teutap ngon mata sijuek ngon ate Sabab boh ate ureueng nyang ceudah Neupeujeuet kamoe jeuet keu peumuka Keu ureueng takwa keupada Allah
